Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that disables the Recover Vessel button for all ships that aren't landed anywhere at the KSC?  I'm trying some recovery immersion, and it's such a habit to go up and push that button on landing.  I'd like to actually have to go recover vessels or kerbals when I miss.

Even better if I could only recover while landed at VAB or SPH.

If it doesn't exist and it's not that hard and someone decides to make it... I'd be interested in the process of how it was written.
